resources.string: 2C, Tufa street, 11340 \nSan Martín del Tesorillo, Cádiz

San Martín Language Center is an English academy with more than 25 years of experience. 

We work with pupils from 4 years old at preschool, primary and secondary education levels. We practice all language skills, such as, Reading, Writing, Listening and Speaking. 
We offer personal attention, small groups and the best prices in our lessons. 
We also take care of the privacy of all our students sice we are covered by the Personal Data Protection Law. 

We are specialized in preparing for Cambridge exams (B1, B2). We get the best results and high percentages of pass rate achieved by our students. 
We take care of registering our students for thei exams. 
Whenever possible, the staff of San Martín Language Center accompany the students on the day of the exam. We advice them and make the access to the facilities easier. 

Invest in your future, learn English and get the official Certification Cambridge English.
